schemas.name: Query.graphql

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/jdolle/graphql-prefab/blob/36b03e916f075c480a96bdb965787eaef94de73f/packages/graphql-prefab-resolvers/examples/demo-server/src/types/Query.graphql:
#import AcceptanceDocument from 'AcceptanceDocument.graphql'
#import Toggle from 'Toggle.graphql'

type Query {
  acceptanceDocument(type: String!): AcceptanceDocument
  allToggles: [Toggle]
}

# https://github.com/jdolle/graphql-prefab/blob/36b03e916f075c480a96bdb965787eaef94de73f/packages/graphql-prefab-resolvers/examples/demo-server/src/types/AcceptanceDocument.graphql:
type AcceptanceDocument {
  acceptanceDocumentVersionUuid: ID!
  # The name of the document
  name: String!
  # The type of document (arbitrary right now)
  documentType: String!
  # The version of the document
  version: String!
  # The URL to the document text
  url: String!
   # The name of the summary
  summaryName: String
  # The URL to the summary text
  summaryUrl: String
  # Indicates wether the app should force the user to scroll to
  # the bottom before accepting
  mustScrollToBottom: Boolean
  # A string indicating a specific app feature that the acceptance
  # of the document is required for using
  requiredFor: String
}

# https://github.com/jdolle/graphql-prefab/blob/36b03e916f075c480a96bdb965787eaef94de73f/packages/graphql-prefab-resolvers/examples/demo-server/src/types/Toggle.graphql:
type Toggle {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  projectString: String!
  createdAt: String!
  updatedAt: String
  ruleId: ID!
}

schemas.name: Toggle.graphql
schemas.content:
type Toggle {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  projectString: String!
  createdAt: String!
  updatedAt: String
  ruleId: ID!
}

schemas.name: AcceptanceDocument.graphql
schemas.content:
type AcceptanceDocument {
  acceptanceDocumentVersionUuid: ID!
  # The name of the document
  name: String!
  # The type of document (arbitrary right now)
  documentType: String!
  # The version of the document
  version: String!
  # The URL to the document text
  url: String!
   # The name of the summary
  summaryName: String
  # The URL to the summary text
  summaryUrl: String
  # Indicates wether the app should force the user to scroll to
  # the bottom before accepting
  mustScrollToBottom: Boolean
  # A string indicating a specific app feature that the acceptance
  # of the document is required for using
  requiredFor: String
}
